LandingPage.title: DeepSafe
LandingPage.headline: Detect Deepfakes with Confidence
LandingPage.description: DeepSafe is an advanced AI-powered tool that analyzes video content to identify sophisticated deepfake manipulations. Protect yourself from misinformation and verify the authenticity of your media.
LandingPage.advancedAnalysisDesc: Leverages state-of-the-art AI models to perform in-depth analysis of video frames, audio, and metadata to detect subtle signs of manipulation.
LandingPage.confidenceScoreDesc: Receive a clear, percentage-based confidence score that indicates the likelihood of a video being a deepfake, making it easy to interpret results.
LandingPage.useWithCautionDesc: As a prototype, our detection is highly effective but not infallible. Always consider the results as a strong indicator, not a final verdict.

LoginPage.title: DeepSafe
LoginPage.createAccount: Create an account to get started.
LoginPage.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
LoginPage.errorNoUser: No user found with this email. Please sign up first.
LoginPage.errorWrongPassword: Incorrect email or password. Please try again.
LoginPage.errorEmailInUse: This email is already registered. Please log in.
LoginPage.errorPopupClosed: Sign-in popup closed. Please try again.
LoginPage.errorUnauthorizedDomain: This domain is not authorized for authentication.

DashboardPage.authErrorDesc: You must be logged in to run an analysis.
DashboardPage.fileReadErrorDesc: Could not read the selected file.
DashboardPage.historyClearedDesc: Your analysis history has been removed.

Header.signOutSuccessDesc: You have been successfully signed out.
Header.signOutFailedDesc: There was an error signing out. Please try again.

HistorySidebar.noHistoryDesc: Your past analyses will appear here.

VideoUploader.uploadVideoDesc: Drag & drop a video file or click to select one for deepfake analysis.
VideoUploader.analyzingDesc: This may take a moment. Please don't close this page.
VideoUploader.invalidFileTypeDesc: Please upload a valid video file.
VideoUploader.fileTooLargeDesc: Please upload a video smaller than 10GB.

AnalysisResultDisplay.manipulationConfidenceDesc: Likelihood of face-swapping or similar edits.

Profile.profileDesc: View and edit your public profile details.
Profile.bioPlaceholder: Tell us a little about yourself
Profile.profileUpdatedDesc: Your details have been saved successfully.
Profile.updateFailedDesc: Could not save your profile. Please try again.

Settings.settingsDesc: Customize the look and feel of the application.
Settings.themeDesc: Select a theme for the application.
